application.name: qview
application.description: This program will display cubes and allow for interactive analysis.

history.change: Port to Qt4 and add blink tool
Fixed bug with filename expansion and added the MeasureTool

Modified FindTool. If a user enters a line/sample in the Image tab, then the corresponding lat/lon is displayed in the Ground tab. Added Record button to FindTool to record clicked or typed point in the AdvancedTrackTool window.
